properties.entry: SELECT round(SUM(metricvalue*leasecount)/SUM(leasecount)*100,1) as exepected FROM Propertymetric WHERE metriccode in (?) AND floorplan = '~' AND unittype = '~' AND aggregationlevel between ? AND ? and propertyid in (?)
